roleset.name: remove a load
roleset.note: UNBURDEN-V NOTES: frame by Perryn. VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls cheat-10.6. (from unburden.01-v)

example.name: Lots of Arrrrrrrrrgs, matey.
example.text: On his voyage back to Europe, a Spanish pirate in league with the Dutch quickly unburdened him of the 7000 pieces of eight ($350000 in today's dollars) he'd so painstakingly filched, leaving Gage in despair.
example.arg: On his voyage back to Europe
a Spanish pirate in league with the Dutch
of the 7000 pieces of eight ($350,000 in today's dollars) he'd so painstakingly filched
